# LATEerror

**LATEerror** implements the generalized method of moments estimation for the local average treatment effect when the binary treatment variable may be mismeasured.
The estimation procedure is developed by Yanagi (2017).


# Intsallation

Run the following code to install **LATEerror**.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tkhdyanagi/LATEerror", build_vignettes = TRUE)
library(LATEerror)
```


# Usage


```{r, eval = FALSE}
LATEerror(Y, D, Z, V, weight = NULL, optimal = TRUE, equal = TRUE, lower = NULL, upper = NULL, control = NULL)
```


# See also

1. See the package vignette via `vignette("LATEerror")` for more details.
